name: texturing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of adding textures (= patterns or images that can be added to the surface of 3-D objects) to computer graphics (= images produced on computer) or film: The software is used for 3-D modelling and texturing. I'd already done some texturing in film.
(of computer graphics or film) the quality of having had textures (= patterns or images that can be added to the surface of 3-D objects) added: The artwork and texturing on the game is beautiful. The model and texturing used in the two figures is the same – they just have a different lighting scheme.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can use a combination of texturing and modelling to create shadow.Keeping the polygon count down can be achieved by clever modelling and texturing.With a little texturing, the image might be recognizable as a car.This tool is used to create the surface texturing of objects.Games often use shading instead of texturing on some surfaces.
